00020 #ifndef __TLM_ANALYSIS_PORT_H__
00021 #define __TLM_ANALYSIS_PORT_H__
00022 
00023 #include "tlm_core/tlm_1/tlm_analysis/tlm_analysis_if.h"
00024 #include <deque>
00025 #include <algorithm>
00026 
00027 namespace tlm {
00028 
00029 
00030 template < typename T>
00031 class tlm_analysis_port :
00032   public sc_core::sc_object ,
00033   public virtual tlm_analysis_if< T >
00034 {
00035  public:
00036   tlm_analysis_port() : sc_core::sc_object() {}
00037   tlm_analysis_port( const char *nm ) : sc_core::sc_object( nm ) {}
00038 
00039   // bind and () work for both interfaces and analysis ports, since
00040   // analysis ports implement the analysis interface
00041 
00042   virtual void bind( tlm_analysis_if<T> &_if ) {
00043     m_interfaces.push_back( &_if );
00044   }
00045 
00046   void operator() ( tlm_analysis_if<T> &_if ) { bind( _if ); }
00047 
00048   virtual bool unbind( tlm_analysis_if<T> &_if ) {
00049 
00050     typename std::deque< tlm_analysis_if<T> * >::iterator i
00051       = std::remove( m_interfaces.begin(), m_interfaces.end(), &_if );
00052 
00053     if( i != m_interfaces.end() ) {
00054       m_interfaces.erase(i, m_interfaces.end() );
00055       return 1;
00056     }
00057 
00058     return 0;
00059 
00060   }
00061 
00062   void write( const T &t ) {
00063     typename std::deque< tlm_analysis_if<T> * >::iterator i;
00064 
00065     for( i = m_interfaces.begin();
00066    i != m_interfaces.end();
00067    i++ ) {
00068 
00069       (*i)->write( t );
00070 
00071     }
00072 
00073   }
00074 
00075  private:
00076   std::deque< tlm_analysis_if<T> * > m_interfaces;
00077 
00078 };
00079 
00080 } // namespace tlm
00081 
00082 #endif
